google_play_reviews.content: It's very good, and the setup is easy. Using it is quite smooth. However, there are a few missing features. 2way sync on the server, and the ability for the server software to read symlinks.

google_play_reviews.content: Thumbnails of uploaded camera photos in app take way too long to load. So it's way too difficult to find photos without thumbnail/preview. Practically defeats the purpose of a backup server when you can't see what you uploaded.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Vincy!

Thanks for your comments! 3.0.1 version was released some days ago. We invite you to try it and see if your problem with thumbnails is solved with this new version. Let us know, your comments are so valuable to us!

Kind regards,

Juan Carlos Garrote
Your ownCloud Team!

google_play_reviews.content: Galaxy A31, Android 12, Owncloud 2.21.2, l am generally very happy with it, but recently found I couldn't access the local content on my phone using the VLC app? How do I do this?
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Shaun!

Thanks for your comments! Some months ago, Google required that all the apps use scoped storage, so that no external apps can access the app's content, with a look at security. You can check more info here: https://central.owncloud.org/t/owncloud-2-19-for-android/34952

Kind regards,

Juan Carlos Garrote
Your ownCloud Team!

google_play_reviews.content: At the moment, I have to re-authorize the app every time I want to use it, and around 50% of the time it doesn't work - very annoying. It's great when it does work, though. Does anyone have a solution?
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Nadya!

Thanks for your rating! We are sorry you are experimenting problems with the app. What do you mean with re-authorize? Related to permissions or to authentication? Please write to our email android-app@owncloud.com so that we can give you a better and individualized support.

Kind regards,

Juan Carlos Garrote
Your ownCloud Team!

google_play_reviews.content: Works great but auto upload feature for images doesn't work so well with a large library
Exceeds all my expectations.
Easy setup and sync with self-hosted server.
Easy to use, works well with kemp loadbancer, highly recommend for home use
Tried next cloud, for run.. but choose own cloud.. cuz it's fast simple and just works.. thx guys for developing this gem.
Not exactly what I thought it would be.
great
Can't believe the incredibly useful file sharing functionality these folks are providing.
It's easy to use and i have no complaints.
please fix all the issues in the client apps all version, linux, macos, ios, android, windows. make the as powerful as the web version.
Works great for self hosted cloud storage
Brand new oauth2 expires every couple days, that's awful
Used to be able to download pictures to my phone. Won't do that any more. App is clunky and won't load all files in the folder in the app.
Oke. Very good
Not easy setting up docker and fstab but when done it's well worth the pain.

Amazing! Downloaded and installed within 15 minutes. Of course I already had a functioning website hosted at namecheap. Within another 15 minutes I had dragged & dropped several images and built public links for relatives to use, to view & download the pics.
